name: Amnesia Dust
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Target creature is dusted with an unusual fey powder and must succeed on an Intuition saving throw. On a success, they lose 1 AP on their next turn. On a failure, they completely forget how to take any action. On their turn, the first time they attempt to use an action they haven't used after being affected by this spell or make an ability check with a stat, it automatically fails and their turn ends.

After ending their turn in this way, a creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the spell on a success.
empower: Affects all creatures within 5 feet of the target.
